Articles.Content: I remember seeing this in some dev blog... where is it?
Well, the last Daily Kerbal post that mentions it, is Alex stating that it is "almost done". I haven't seen anything saying that it's complete.

The 1 feature I read that it had was that if you built a rocket with insufficient thrust, or delta-V, or forgot power or something, it would tell you instead of letting you watch it explode or otherwise fail. What a buzzkill
What? It has a built-in OSHA inspector?! Kill it with fire from a mainsail.
That's why it's the EDU version and not our version.
I'd really love to see some promotion for this version. It sounds like a wonderful educational tool to get kids excited about science.
